name: Do Nut Steal
description:
Do Nut Steal is a game about protecting your Donut. Use your inflatable body and  your sucking ability to defend your precious bakery! 

  • How your submission matches the theme?
    You perform all actions with the space-bar.
    You can either deflect enemies, or suck them up to use them as powerful projectiles.
    The Donut is the item you need to protect but you can also use him as a weapon to kill enemies and rack up points. 
  • Plattform: Windows
  • Everything was made in 48h. No 3rd Party Assets
  • Contributors:
    Christina Obereigner (Coding)
    Daniel Stolzlederer (Gamedesign/Art)
